reporter_caption.center: MOZZOCHI v. FREEDOM OF INFORMATION COMMISSION, 241 Conn. 919 (1997)

caption.center: C. J. MOZZOCHI v. FREEDOM OF INFORMATION COMMISSION ET AL.
TOWN OF GLASTONBURY v. C. J. MOZZOCHI

opinion.opinion_text: The petition by the plaintiff in the first case and the defendant in the second case for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 44 Conn. App. 463 (AC 15193), is denied.
opinion.dissent_text:
We would grant the petition for certification for appeal.
John R. Williams, in support of the petition.
William B. Rogers and Victor Perpetua, in opposition.
